DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine long-term survivorship clinical outcome cryopreserved meniscus transplant perform Dr. Frank Noyes .
DOC.detailed_description: All patient receive cryopreserved meniscus transplant follow 1 , 2 , 5 , 10 , 15 year postoperatively . Study examination include comprehensive knee examination Dr. Noyes , x-rays , potentially MRI . Patients complete follow form Cincinnati Knee Rating System : Symptom Rating Form , Sports Activity Function Form , Occupational Rating Form . All patient identification keep confidential . Patient data enter Knee Registry database accord unique study number clinical research assistant .
DOC.criteria: Patient postmeniscectomy Patient symptomatic activity Patient early articular cartilage degeneration affect tibiofemoral compartment Patient understand goal operation , willing undergo lengthy rehabilitation Patient symptoms activity Patient advance degeneration affect tibiofemoral compartment compartment Patient obese ( BMI > 30 ) Patient uncorrected low limb axial malalignment knee ligament deficiency Patient active infection Patient preexist knee arthrofibrosis lower limb muscular atrophy Patient symptomatic patellofemoral articular cartilage deterioration Patient unwilling undergo lengthy rehabilitation surgery
